subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Whether LeBron James’s decision to join Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh on the Heat earns him lasting attention in a football-oriented town will depend on how much he wins.
snippet: Whether LeBron James’s decision to join Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh on the Heat earns him lasting attention in a football-oriented town will depend on how much he wins.
